text: When you realize it's Monday morning and you have to go to work.
That moment when you try to explain your favorite meme to someone who doesn't get it.
When you accidentally hit 'Reply All' on a company-wide email.
When you see your ex in public and try to act casual.
When you're trying to hold in a sneeze during an important meeting.
When the Wi-Fi goes out in the middle of your favorite show.
When you thought you had a lot of money left, but then rent hits.
When you walk into a room and immediately forget why you went in there.
When someone says, 'Let's hang out,' but you really just want to stay home.
When you finish a series on Netflix and don't know what to do with your life.
When you realize you've been talking to someone with AirPods in the whole time.
When your phone autocorrects a word to something embarrassing.
When the barista spells your name wrong on your coffee cup, again.
When your friend tells you they're 'on their way' but you know they just got out of bed.
When you're trying to eat healthy but someone brings donuts to the office.
When your favorite song comes on, and you're alone in the car.
When you laugh at a text but it's not actually funny.
When your parents ask you to help with 'this computer thing'.
When you wake up from a nap and don't know what day it is.
When you're halfway through a story and realize no one is listening.
When you try to act natural after tripping in public.
When you finally get a text back after waiting for hours.
When you tell a joke and nobody laughs, so you just laugh awkwardly.
When you're on a diet but the dessert table is calling your name.
When you open the fridge for the fifth time, hoping new food has appeared.
When someone spoils the ending of the show you're binge-watching.
When you get tagged in a photo that you didn't know was being taken.
When you're trying to sleep but remember that one embarrassing thing you did years ago.
When you accidentally like an old photo while stalking someone's Instagram.
When you realize you've been muted on a Zoom call the whole time you were talking.
When you try to take a cute selfie but the front camera catches you off guard.
When you realize your favorite shirt is still in the laundry basket.
When you see someone from high school and they don't recognize you.
When you send a risky text and see the typing dots appear.
When your phone dies right before you can send an important message.
When you try to impress someone and immediately embarrass yourself.
When your favorite artist drops a surprise album and you weren't ready.
When you run into someone you know at the grocery store and try to avoid them.
When you realize you've been talking to yourself for the past 10 minutes.
When you're in the middle of a great dream and your alarm goes off.
When you say 'you too' after the waiter tells you to enjoy your meal.
When you check your bank account after a night out.
When you remember something cringey you did in middle school.
When you finish a really good book and feel lost.
When you're in the shower and come up with the perfect comeback for an argument you had last week.
When someone waves at you and you wave back, but then realize they were waving at someone else.
When you pretend to text to avoid an awkward situation.
When you try to be productive but end up procrastinating all day.
When you overhear someone talking about your favorite TV show.
When you realize you left something important at home after you're already halfway to work.
When you meet someone with the same name as you and things get weird.
When you send a message to the wrong group chat.
When you're trying to sound smart in a conversation but have no idea what you're talking about.
When you realize you've been walking in the wrong direction for 10 minutes.
When you wake up late and have to get ready in record time.
When you find money in a jacket you haven't worn in ages.
When you're the only one who remembers an inside joke from years ago.
When you accidentally open your front camera and catch a glimpse of yourself.
When you try to act like you're not cold, but it's freezing outside.
When you walk into a spider web and immediately start flailing.
When you hear someone start talking about politics at a family gathering.
When you're out in public and your stomach starts making weird noises.
When you text someone to hang out and they respond with 'who all is going?'
When you're the first one to laugh in a serious situation.
When your phone is at 1% but you can't find your charger.
When you realize you've been mispronouncing a word your entire life.
When you check the time and realize your nap lasted four hours.
When someone asks you to share your food but you really don't want to.
When you try to explain your job to someone and they still don't get it.
When you walk into a store and forget what you came for.
When you're trying to sleep, but your brain suddenly decides to remind you of every embarrassing moment in your life.
When you hear someone chewing loudly and it drives you crazy.
When you try to act calm but are freaking out on the inside.
When your favorite team scores at the last second.
When you spend forever getting ready and someone cancels last minute.
When you see the check engine light come on in your car.
When your pet does something cute and you immediately forgive them for being a little demon.
When you walk out of a movie and can't stop talking about it.
When you finally get comfy and realize you forgot to do something important.
When you make plans and immediately regret it.
When your phone starts ringing in a really quiet place.
When you binge-watch an entire season in one day and don't know what to do next.
When you're trying to be healthy but someone orders pizza.
When you're waiting for a package and hear the delivery truck outside.
When you realize you're the only one in the group chat who doesn't understand the joke.
When you're in a deep sleep and someone wakes you up for something trivial.
When you realize you've been spelling someone's name wrong for years.
When you're trying to act interested but have no idea what they're talking about.
When you're trying to leave a party but keep getting stuck in conversations.
When you see someone you know but can't remember their name.
When you finally finish a big project and can breathe again.
When you're about to give up on a game but somehow pull off a miracle win.
